hadiths.text: It was narrated that Rafi` bin khadij said:We used to give land in return for food at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and some of my paternal uncles came to them and said: “The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever has land, he should not rent it out for a set amount of food.”

chapter.eng-name: Renting Out Land In Return For Food
